Items.mt: When Chai Yao was sent to the north, he was too late to come back to save the kingdom during the mutiny, so he turned to cultivate his power in secret. The people of Song were disgusted by the Manichaeism, and they were able to overthrow the Great Sovereign in one fell swoop. But when the people don't comply, Chai Yao has no choice but to use more terrible methods.
